This law constitutes a historic step to build together a more tolerant, inclusive and welcoming Chile for all.

Today, at age 93, Enrique Silva Cimma died, a distinguished jurist, academic and extraordinary public servant. My love and appreciation to his family
Enrique Silva Cimma deserves our recognition and gratitude for his valuable and generous services to the country during his fruitful life.
I have decided to decree official grief to honor his memory and recognize his great career and contribution to Chile. A loving hug to his family

The Council of Ministers decided to increase the salaries of those who are disabled pensioners and widows from 135 dinars to 225 dinars per month.
The government decided to increase the salary for those who are handicapped, widows and orphans from 135 to 225 Dinars per month.
@ibntarabulus This will be increased to 450 LD January 2013. We will pay them the 225 starting February 2011.
These salaries will increase to 450 dinars in January 2013. These salaries will be increased to 450 LD in January 2013.

Yesterday, three members of the House of Councilors, Ms. Zhoushan, Mr. Gyoda and Ms. Tanioka, gave a notice of departure notification. Three people are very good people with a thought of the people. As for the fact that such an excellent lawmaker wanted to leave the party, I heard that the executive department has no color of reflection. That's why you want to leave the party.
